name: My World Focal Hollow Glass Bead
description:
You don't have to go far to see a dynamic world with beauty as its premise...

About the Tectonics Series:

The aesthetic appeal behind this design is that of quiet movement and yet of great significance to us. 
While exploring the surface, it is easy to embrace an ever-changing appearance of this bead as we perceive it at different times while holding it in our hand and fold it into our imagination.

The process by which I arrive at this design includes several stages. First I blow a multi-layered ball on the end of a steel pipe and, in addition to different  transparent and opaque glass, I incorporate enamels, fine silver and pure copper metal foils. 
The next step consists of cooling the ball and then breaking it into shards which are rich in color and form and look like broken pieces of glass. 
I then preheat these shards in a kiln and apply them to a surface of a hot bead in a torch flame.
As result each bead is truly one of a kind and a piece born in the moment.

The idea of creating and breaking, and then re-creating and forming each bead in this collection drives interpretation and meaning-making which is an integral part of our everyday. That's what I love most about this collection.


This is a dynamic focal glass bead which will serve you as a pendant and/or a sculpture.

Measurements: 1.45 in x 1.9 in
Hole size: 0.28 in

name: Seed Heaven Vessel
description:
Tiny pink seeds nested up and down streams of promise...
Orange, purple, teal and aqua - true cross-pollination requires color and lots of it!

Keep a loving message or a drop of your favorite essential oil, either way this vessel is beyond containment...

Would you like to wear it? Simply use your favorite chain or a fabric cord of your choice. Let me know if you'd like my help with that; we'll brainstorm together based on what you like.

Length: 2 in long 
At its widest: 1.5 in 
Opening: appr. 0.3 in

Let me know if you have questions.

Thank you for your interest in my work.

name: Suleika One-of-a-Kind Vessel
description:
Suleika is an Arabic name which means most beautiful woman.

This vessel reminds me of a beautiful woman whose warmth, movement and colorful elegance keeps the imagination wanting more...

Keep a loving message or a drop of your favorite essential oil, either way this vessel is beyond containment...

Would you like to wear it? Simply use your favorite chain or a fabric cord of your choice. Let me know if you'd like my help with that; we'll brainstorm together based on what you like.

Length: 2.2 in long
At its widest: 1.3 in
Opening: appr. 0.3 in

Let me know if you have questions.

Thank you for your interest in my work.

name: Blue & Green Berry Extraordinaire Focal Glass Bead
description:
Contemporary, Urban, Elegant...

Sensual and bursting with flavor, berries are a product of a living plant. Liliana's designs are abstractions of berry shapes and forms utilizing natural properties of glass.
A sculptural lampwork glass bead, Berry Extraordinaire is designed and handmade by Liliana.

Wear this bead on a necklace you love and already own or purchase one from Liliana. The end that goes in should be 4 mm in diameter or less.

Measurements: Focal bead - appr. 1". The colors this bead is available in range from aqua, amber, lime green to amethyst, etc. and more (just ask).

This bead is made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

Thank you for your interest.

name: Orange, Lavender, Teal Berry Cluster Earrings
description:
Colorful and playful, these earring are light and will bring a smile to every style!

Glass beads designed and handmade by Liliana along with semi-precious stones, assembled with sterling silver.

These earrings are just over 1 1/2" long.
They are ready to ship.

name: Spring is in the Air, Sweet Bird Earrings
description:
How do I know that Spring is in the Air?

The sweet sweet lavender birds with heart-shaped wings, peeking out of a cluster of semi-precious stone beads, tells more that you will like hearing...

Assembled with sterling silver wire, these earrings are light and extremely playful, while elegant and modern.

They are 2" long.

Ready to ship.

name: Purchase All 5 Tutorials and Save $15
description:
I wrote these tutorials with the beginner in mind and have offered multiple clues to working with glass that have served me very well. They are a great resource for a beginner to an intermediate-level lampworker.

I will send the tutorials to you via email within 24 hours of purchase (please make sure that I have your correct e-mail address) in PDF files.
You will need Acrobat Reader to open the file and you may acquire it at no cost on internet.

If you have not received your tutorials within this time please look in your spam file, as sometimes email servers reject files with attachments and put them into your spam folder. 

No refunds.

Please let me know if you have questions.
Thanks for stopping by.

name: Heart Pendant - LilianaBead Lampwork Bead and Jewelry Tutorial
description:
I wrote this tutorial with the beginner in mind and have offered multiple clues to working with glass that have served me very well. This tutorial is a great resource for an intermediate-level lampworker as well.

This tutorial is 55 pages long and I used 94 images to illustrate step-by-step instructions explaining this technique which also includes making the bail and finishing the pendant.

The photos were taken by a professional photographer and a wonderful artist, my friend Marie Craig.

I used Moretti/Effetre and Kugler 104 to create the bead in the photos.

I will send this tutorial to you via email within 24 hours of purchase (please make sure that I have your correct e-mail address) in a PDF file.
You will need Acrobat Reader to open the file and you may acquire it at no cost on internet.

If you have not received your tutorial within this time please look in your spam file, as sometimes email servers reject files with attachments and put them into your spam folder.

name: LilianaBead Apple Core Design - Starting with the Center - Lampwork Bead Tutorial
description:
This tutorial focuses on a beautiful design which lies at basis of the apple core design. Long before I made an apple core for years I made this bead and developed it to where it is now.

Why would you purchase this tutorial if you can just purchase the Apple Core Design Tutorial? This tutorial is different in that the goal of it is

1) to show you how to make the bead in the image;
2) to start you thinking about designs as modules that will lead you to more composite designs of your own;
3) to get you to practice several techniques that make this design what it is;
4) to introduce you to concepts of color use to accentuate depth and color in glass.

The clues I offer here make each step more comprehensive and strategic. They are perceptibly different from tutorial to tutorial. I rarely copy and paste. My preference is to think about each tutorial in the moment as having its own logic and a distinct flow of words and expression. Thus, you will learn something different from each of them even though processes might appear as similar if not identical.

I wrote this tutorial with the beginner in mind and have offered multiple clues to working with glass that have served me very well. This tutorial is a great resource for an intermediate-level lampworker as well.

This tutorial is 27 pages long and I used 36 images to illustrate step-by-step instructions explaining this technique. The photos were taken by a professional photographer and a wonderful artist, my friend Marie Craig.

I used Moretti/Effetre and Kugler 104 to create the bead in the photos.

I will send this tutorial to you via email within 24 hours of purchase (please make sure that I have your correct e-mail address) in a PDF file.
You will need Acrobat Reader to open the file and you may acquire it at no cost on internet.

If you have not received your tutorial within this time try looking in your spam file, as sometimes email servers reject files with attachments and put them into your spam folder. 

No refunds.

Please let me know if you have questions.
Thanks for stopping by.

name: LilianaBead Tutorial - The Apple Core Design - Lampwork Bead
description:
The purpose of this tutorial is to show you how I make the Apple Core Bead.

If you've purchased the LilianaBead Apple Core Design - Starting with the Center - Part One - Lampwork Bead Tutorial please read my blog entry about the two tutorials at http://lilianabead.blogspot.com/.

I wrote this tutorial with the intermediate beginner in mind and have offered multiple clues to working with glass that have served me very well. This tutorial is a great resource for an intermediate-level lampworker as well.

This tutorial is 51 pages long and I used 70 process images to illustrate step-by-step instructions. Each instruction is followed by clues for you to attend as you execute each step.

The photos were taken by a professional photographer and a wonderful artist, my friend Marie Craig.

I used Moretti/Effetre and Kugler 104 to create the bead in the photos.

I will send this tutorial to you via email within 24 hours of purchase (please make sure that I have your correct e-mail address) in a PDF file.
You will need Acrobat Reader to open the file and you may acquire it at no cost on internet.

If you have not received your tutorial within this time try looking in your spam file, as sometimes email servers reject files with attachments and put them into your spam folder. 

No refunds.

Please let me know if you have questions.
Thanks for stopping by.

name: Renaissance Melon - Earrings
description:
Classy, elegant and yet very playful and light, these earrings will bring color to any outfit.

The Renaissance Collection is inspired by the invigorating and elegant wear of the epoch.

The overall length is approximately 1" 1/4. The earrings are made with sterling silver. All components are handmade by Liliana.
The earrings vary slightly in size etc. as each component is handmade on at a time. 

These earrings are made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

Item Number: RSM - E01

description:

name: Berry Extraordinaire with Seeds Necklace
description:
Luscious and succulent, this collection is about color and style. 

Sensual and bursting with flavor, berries are a product of a living plant and the seeds are promising future life. 

Liliana's designs are abstractions of berry shapes and forms utilizing natural properties of glass - color and light.

The focal glass bead measures approximately 1" in diameter. 

The sterling silver omega chain, finished with a comparable small glass bead and a handmade clasp, accentuates the glass and adds to its classy appearance in the back as well. 
The length of the chain measures about 18" long including a short extension. You may request additional extension at extra cost depending on length.

This necklace is made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

Item Number: BE - N01

name: Fine Silver Wire in Glass - Earrings
description:
The glass beads in this collection contain fine silver globules. 

The findings are made by Liliana with sterling silver. These earrings are approximately 1 1/2" long. If you prefer them shorter, please let me know and I'll gladly accommodate you.

The earrings vary slightly in size etc. as each component is handmade on at a time. 

This is a very popular collection as the beads take on a life of brilliance in daylight. The colors are bright and exciting.

These earrings are made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

name: Fine Silver in Glass: Necklace with Three Focal Beads
description:
This collection is built on a specialty of mine - fine silver inside glass. 

The elegance of this collection is superb as the beads take on a life of brilliance in daylight.

The wavy chain is sterling silver with a handmade clasp; it measures approximately 17 1/2" with the option of a short extension up to 18". You may request additional extension at extra cost depending on length.

The beads are available in several colors. They vary slightly in size etc. as each one is handmade on at a time.

This necklace is made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

Item Number: FSG - N301

name: Water Series: Focal Bead on Wavy Chain
description:
This design is inspired by water: the moment of seeing moving water is undeniably fleeting.

This collection is built on a specialty of mine - fine silver inside glass. The silver wire introduces continuity while a prism of layers and layers of clear give the sensation of movement and depth in these pieces. The beads take on a life of brilliance in daylight.

The wavy chain is sterling silver with a handmade clasp; it measures approximately 17 1/2" with the option of a short extension up to 18". You may request additional extension at extra cost depending on length.

The beads are available in several colors. They vary slightly in size etc. as each one is handmade on at a time.

This necklace is made to order. Please allow up to two weeks. I will e-mail you with details.

Item Number: FSG - N101

name: Water Series: Focal in Coral Ambers & Periwinkle
description:
About the Water Series:

This design is inspired by WATER; it is built on a specialty of mine - fine silver inside glass.

The silver wire and a touch of pure gold introduces continuity while a prism of layers and layers of clear give the sensation of movement and depth in these pieces.

This is a collection built on my visual and social experience of water - while I know what water looks like and feels like, 
the moment of seeing moving water is undeniably fleeting.

This is a dynamic focal glass bead which will serve you as a pendant and/or a sculpture.

Give an old chain a new life in your collection. Or, if you'd like to purchase a chain, please let me know.

name: Landscape in Aqua & Pink Earrings
description:
Layers of color and depth.
Light and elegant.

These earrings are that exclamation sign we are sometimes looking for to turn a statement into a poem.

The earrings are made with sterling silver wire.

Ready to ship.

name: Tectonics Series: Focal in Orange Ambers & Brown Ivory Coil
description:
About the Tectonics Series:

The aesthetic appeal behind this design is that of quiet movement and yet of great significance to us. 
While exploring the surface, it is easy to embrace an ever-changing appearance of this bead as we perceive it at different times while holding it in our hand and fold it into our imagination.

The process by which I arrive at this design includes several stages. First I blow a multi-layered ball on the end of a steel pipe and, in addition to different transparent and opaque glass, I incorporate enamels, fine silver and pure copper metal foils. 
The next step consists of cooling the ball and then breaking it into shards which are rich in color and form and look like broken pieces of glass. 
I then preheat these shards in a kiln and apply them to a surface of a hot bead in a torch flame. 
As result each bead is truly one of a kind and a piece born in the moment.

The idea of creating and breaking, and then re-creating and forming each bead in this collection drives interpretation and meaning-making which is an integral part of our everyday. That's what I love most about this collection.

This is a dynamic focal glass bead which will serve you as a pendant and/or a sculpture.

Give an old chain a new life in your collection. Or, if you'd like to purchase a chain, please let me know.

name: Amber Gold Zen Earrings
description:

A nice light flowing gold line that serves this amber glass bead with a touch of amethyst pink..

They are quite light and elegant.

name: Aqua Glass Beads w Fine Silver Interchangeable Sterling Silver Earrings & Necklace
description:
Light, fluid, elegance, surprise, brilliance... These are some words that customers have used to describe this collection.

Silver and glass that is as fluid and adaptable as your mood or your wardrobe. 
Fine silver suspended inside glass - Wear these beads on sterling silver interchangeable drop earrings or on a light sterling silver wavy chain. 

This set includes two beads, a pair of earrings and a wavy sterling silver chain.
The post is appr. 1/2 inch long
The wavy necklace is 16" long.

While supplies last: I just have a few of these interchangeable sets left.
Ready to ship.

If you'd like to order additional beads in different colors, please convo me and I will gladly make them for you. You can add just one additional bead in a different color or two for more variety and use with your interchangeable jewelry.
